headline.main: BROADCAST WARNS JAPANESE ON WAR; Thomas of Utah, In Their Language, Scores 'Betrayal' by War Lords DERIDES VICTORY CLAIMS Dwindling Resources of Axis Are Contrasted With Rising Capacity of Allies

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Dec. 31 -- Over unidentified short-wave radio stations, Senator Thomas of Utah addressed the Japanese people in their own tongue tonight, speaking the New Year's Day message of a former friend who lived long among them but who now told them that they have been betrayed by the war lords and "sold out" to Hitler.
abstract: U S Sen E D Thomas warns Jap pub against war lords, radio s
